knimeNode.name: BAMLoader
knimeNode.shortDescription: BAMLoader - loads a BAM file and a fastA file

fullDescription.intro: BAMLoader loads SamTools, an alignment file (BAM) and a reference genome file (fastA) to run other nodes, that need these files, e.g. SamTools, SNPcall or Mpileup.
fullDescription.option: Please select a reference file in fastA format.
Please select a alignment file in sorted and indexed BAM format.

ports.outPort:
Cell 0: Path to the alignment BAM file
Cell 1: Path to the genome reference sequence in fastA format
